hero.description: Istanbul Online is your trusted technology partner in digital transformation. We develop web applications, mobile solutions, and enterprise software that drive business growth.

about.label: About Us
about.description: Istanbul Online has been developing innovative software solutions for healthcare, finance, and e-commerce sectors since 2019. With our experienced team, we digitize our clients' business processes and provide competitive advantage.

architecture.title: Modern Architecture
architecture.description: Scalable and secure infrastructure with cutting-edge technologies

security.title: Security Focused
security.description: GDPR compliant systems with end-to-end encryption

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our expert technical team is always by your side

projects.label: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of the projects we have delivered across different industries

doctorio.title: Doctor Portfolio Website
doctorio.description: Professionally designed custom portfolio websites for doctors. Modern design, easy management panel and patient contact forms.

banausta.title: banausta
banausta.description: Digital platform connecting craftsmen and customers. Easy access to plumbers, electricians, painters and more service providers.

services.label: Our Services
services.subtitle: We develop custom software solutions tailored to your business needs

web.title: Web Applications
web.description: Modern and responsive web applications. High-performance solutions with React, Vue.js and Next.js.

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Native and cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android. Development with React Native and Flutter.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Software
enterprise.description: ERP, CRM and custom business process solutions. Scalable and secure infrastructure.

api.title: API Development
api.description: RESTful and GraphQL API design. Third-party integrations and microservice architecture.

cloud.title: Cloud Solutions
cloud.description: Infrastructure setup, management and optimization on AWS, Azure and Google Cloud.

consulting.title: Technology Consulting
consulting.description: Digital transformation strategy, technology selection and project management consulting.

items.text: Doctor.io made our clinic management incredibly easy. Istanbul Online team is professional and solution-oriented.
items.author: Dr. Ahmet Ozkan

items.text: They delivered our e-commerce project on time and within budget. They are also very fast in technical support.
items.author: Elif Yildiz

items.text: Thanks to Bana Usta platform, our business doubled. They did an amazing job.
items.author: Murat Kaya

cta.description: We're here to listen to your ideas and offer you the best solution. Contact us now for a free consultation.

contact.label: Contact
contact.description: Reach out to discuss your project or ask your questions. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: Leading digital transformation of businesses with innovative software solutions.
